exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Resting pose for recovery and gentle back stretch
exercises.instructions: Kneel on floor, sit back on heels. Fold forward, extending arms in front or resting by sides. Forehead towards floor. Breathe deeply into back body.

modifications.easier: Place pillow under forehead or between heels and hips
modifications.harder: Extend arms further, walk fingers forward

exercises.name: Downward Facing Dog
exercises.description: Full body stretch, builds strength and flexibility
exercises.instructions: Start on hands and knees. Lift hips up and back, forming inverted V. Hands shoulder-width, feet hip-width. Press heels towards floor, relax head between arms.

modifications.easier: Bend knees, or use blocks under hands
modifications.harder: Lift one leg to three-legged dog

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.instructions: Start on hands and knees. Inhale: drop belly, lift chest and tailbone (cow). Exhale: round spine, tuck chin and tailbone (cat). Flow smoothly between positions.

modifications.easier: Make movements smaller, place padding under knees

exercises.name: Warrior I
exercises.description: Standing strength pose for legs and hip flexors
exercises.instructions: Step one foot back, turning it out 45 degrees. Front knee bends over ankle. Square hips forward. Raise arms overhead, palms facing. Hold, then switch sides.

modifications.harder: Deepen the lunge, look up at hands

exercises.name: Warrior II
exercises.description: Standing pose for leg strength and hip opening
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet wide. Turn one foot out 90 degrees, other foot slightly in. Bend front knee over ankle. Extend arms parallel to floor, gaze over front hand.

modifications.easier: Shorten stance, don't bend knee as deep

exercises.name: Tree Pose
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg. Place other foot on inner calf or thigh (not knee). Bring hands to heart centre or extend overhead. Find a focal point. Hold, then switch.

modifications.easier: Toe on floor for support, hand on wall
modifications.harder: Close eyes, or extend arms overhead

exercises.name: Cobra Pose
exercises.instructions: Lie face down, hands under shoulders. Press into hands to lift chest, keeping hips on floor. Draw shoulders back, gaze forward. Keep elbows slightly bent.

modifications.easier: Baby cobra - keep lift small, forearms on floor

exercises.name: Pigeon Pose
exercises.instructions: From downward dog, bring one knee forward behind same-side wrist. Extend other leg straight back. Square hips. Walk hands forward to fold over front leg.

modifications.easier: Place block under hip, or do figure-4 stretch on back
modifications.harder: Keep torso upright, add quad stretch with back leg

exercises.name: Seated Forward Fold
exercises.instructions: Sit with legs extended. Inhale to lengthen spine. Exhale to hinge at hips, reaching towards feet. Keep spine long rather than rounding. Hold where you feel stretch.

modifications.easier: Bend knees, use a strap around feet
modifications.harder: Grab feet, draw chest to thighs

exercises.name: Corpse Pose
exercises.instructions: Lie flat on back. Let feet fall open, arms by sides with palms up. Close eyes. Release all effort. Breathe naturally. Stay present, allow complete relaxation.

modifications.easier: Bolster under knees, blanket for warmth
modifications.harder: N/A - this is meant to be effortless

exercises.name: Standing Forward Fold
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width. Hinge at hips, folding torso over legs. Let head hang heavy. Hands can touch floor, grab elbows, or rest on shins. Bend knees as needed.

exercises.name: Bridge Pose
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat near hips. Press into feet to lift hips. Clasp hands underneath, roll shoulders under. Keep thighs parallel. Hold and breathe.

modifications.easier: Place block under sacrum for supported bridge
modifications.harder: Lift one leg, or interlace hands under back
